text: Mount Martin may refer to: * Mount Martin (Alaska), a stratovolcano in Alaska, United States * Mount Martin (Antarctica), a mountain in Antarctica * Mount Martin (British Columbia), a mountain in British Columbia, Canada * Mount Martin (Yukon), a mountain in Yukon, Canada * Mount Martin, Queensland, a town in Queensland, Australia * Mont Martin in Quebec, Canada ==See also== * Mount Martine * Mount Martyn
title: Mount Martin
